verses.verse: Moreover, <WG1161> brethren,<WG80> I declare<WG1107> unto you<WG5213> the<WG3588> gospel<WG2098> which<WG3739> I preached<WG2097> unto you,<WG5213> which<WG3739> also<WG2532> ye have received,<WG3880> and<WG2532> wherein<WG1722> <WG3739> ye stand;<WG2476>

By <WG1223> which<WG3739> also<WG2532> ye are saved,<WG4982> if<WG1487> ye keep in memory<WG2722> what<WG5101> I<WG3056> preached<WG2097> unto you,<WG5213> unless<WG1622> <WG1508> ye have believed<WG4100> in vain.<WG1500>

For <WG1063> I delivered<WG3860> unto you<WG5213> first of all<WG1722> <WG4413> that which<WG3739> I also<WG2532> received,<WG3880> how that<WG3754> Christ<WG5547> died<WG599> for<WG5228> our<WG2257> sins<WG266> according<WG2596> to the<WG3588> Scriptures;<WG1124>
And <WG2532> that<WG3754> he was buried,<WG2290> and<WG2532> that<WG3754> he rose again<WG1453> the<WG3588> third<WG5154> day<WG2250> according<WG2596> to the<WG3588> Scriptures: <WG1124>
And <WG2532> that<WG3754> he was seen<WG3700> of Cephas,<WG2786> then<WG1534> of the<WG3588> twelve: <WG1427>

After that,<WG1899> he was seen<WG3700> of above<WG1883> five hundred<WG4001> brethren<WG80> at once;<WG2178> of<WG1537> whom<WG3739> the<WG3588> greater part<WG4119> remain<WG3306> unto<WG2193> this present,<WG737> but<WG1161> some<WG5100> are<WG2532> fallen asleep.<WG2837>
After that,<WG1899> he was seen<WG3700> of James;<WG2385> then<WG1534> of all<WG3956> the<WG3588> apostles.<WG652>
And <WG1161> last<WG2078> of all<WG3956> he was seen<WG3700> of me also,<WG2504> as<WG5619> of one born out of due time.<WG1626>

For <WG1063> I<WG1473> am<WG1510> the<WG3588> least<WG1646> of the<WG3588> apostles,<WG652> that<WG3739> am<WG1510> not<WG3756> meet<WG2425> to be called<WG2564> an apostle,<WG652> because<WG1360> I persecuted<WG1377> the<WG3588> church<WG1577> of God.<WG2316>

But <WG1161> by the grace<WG5485> of God<WG2316> I am<WG1510> what<WG3739> I am:<WG1510> and<WG2532> his<WG848> grace<WG5485> which<WG3588> was bestowed upon<WG1519> me<WG1691> was<WG1096> not<WG3756> in vain;<WG2756> but<WG235> I labored<WG2872> more abundantly<WG4054> than they<WG846> all:<WG3956> yet<WG1161> not<WG3756> I,<WG1473> but<WG235> the<WG3588> grace<WG5485> of God<WG2316> which<WG3588> was with<WG4862> me.<WG1698>
Therefore <WG3767> whether<WG1535> it were I<WG1473> or they,<WG1565> so<WG3779> we preach,<WG2784> and<WG2532> so<WG3779> ye believed.<WG4100>

Now <WG1161> if<WG1487> Christ<WG5547> be preached<WG2784> that<WG3754> he rose<WG1453> from<WG1537> the dead,<WG3498> how<WG4459> say<WG3004> some<WG5100> among<WG1722> you<WG5213> that<WG3754> there is<WG2076> no<WG3756> resurrection<WG386> of the dead?<WG3498>
But <WG1161> if<WG1487> there be<WG2076> no<WG3756> resurrection<WG386> of the dead,<WG3498> then is Christ<WG5547> not<WG3761> risen: <WG1453>
And <WG1161> if<WG1487> Christ<WG5547> be not<WG3756> risen,<WG1453> then<WG686> is our<WG2257> preaching<WG2782> vain,<WG2756> and<WG1161> your<WG5216> faith<WG4102> is also<WG2532> vain.<WG2756>

Yea, <WG1161> and<WG2532> we are found<WG2147> false witnesses<WG5575> of God;<WG2316> because<WG3754> we have testified<WG3140> of<WG2596> God<WG2316> that<WG3754> he raised up<WG1453> Christ:<WG5547> whom<WG3739> he raised not up,<WG1453> <WG3756> if so be that<WG1512> <WG686> the dead<WG3498> rise<WG1453> not.<WG3756>
For <WG1063> if<WG1487> the dead<WG3498> rise<WG1453> not,<WG3756> then is not<WG3761> Christ<WG5547> raised: <WG1453>
And <WG1161> if<WG1487> Christ<WG5547> be not<WG3756> raised,<WG1453> your<WG5216> faith<WG4102> is vain;<WG3152> ye are<WG2075> yet<WG2089> in<WG1722> your<WG5216> sins.<WG266>
Then <WG686> they also which are fallen asleep<WG2837> <WG2532> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> are perished.<WG622>
If <WG1487> in<WG1722> this<WG5026> life<WG2222> only<WG3440> we have<WG2070> hope<WG1679> in<WG1722> Christ,<WG5547> we are<WG2070> of all<WG3956> men<WG444> most miserable.<WG1652>
But <WG1161> now<WG3570> is Christ<WG5547> risen<WG1453> from<WG1537> the dead,<WG3498> and become<WG1096> the firstfruits<WG536> of them that slept.<WG2837>
For <WG1063> since<WG1894> by<WG1223> man<WG444> came death,<WG2288> by<WG1223> man<WG444> came also<WG2532> the resurrection<WG386> of the dead.<WG3498>
For <WG1063> as<WG5618> in<WG1722> Adam<WG76> all<WG3956> die,<WG599> even<WG2532> so<WG3779> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> shall all<WG3956> be made alive.<WG2227>

But <WG1161> every man<WG1538> in<WG1722> his own<WG2398> order:<WG5001> Christ<WG5547> the firstfruits;<WG536> afterward<WG1899> they<WG3588> that are Christ's<WG5547> at<WG1722> his<WG848> coming.<WG3952>

Then <WG1534> cometh the<WG3588> end,<WG5056> when<WG3752> he shall have delivered up<WG3860> the<WG3588> kingdom<WG932> to God,<WG2316> even<WG2532> the Father;<WG3962> when<WG3752> he shall have put down<WG2673> all<WG3956> rule<WG746> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> authority<WG1849> and<WG2532> power.<WG1411>
For <WG1063> he<WG846> must<WG1163> reign,<WG936> till<WG891> <WG3757> he hath put<WG5087> all<WG3956> enemies<WG2190> under<WG5259> his<WG848> feet.<WG4228>
The last<WG2078> enemy<WG2190> that shall be destroyed<WG2673> is death.<WG2288>

For <WG1063> he hath put<WG5293> all things<WG3956> under<WG5259> his<WG848> feet.<WG4228> But<WG1161> when<WG3752> he saith<WG2036> <WG3754> all things<WG3956> are put under<WG5293> him, it is manifest<WG1212> that<WG3754> he is excepted,<WG1622> which did put all things under<WG5293> <WG3956> him.<WG846>

And <WG1161> when<WG3752> all things<WG3956> shall be subdued unto<WG5293> him,<WG846> then<WG5119> shall the<WG3588> Son<WG5207> also<WG2532> himself<WG848> be subject<WG5293> unto him that put all things under<WG5293> <WG3956> him,<WG846> that<WG2443> God<WG2316> may be<WG5600> all<WG3956> in<WG1722> all.<WG3956>

Else <WG1893> what<WG5101> shall they do<WG4160> which are baptized<WG907> for<WG5228> the<WG3588> dead,<WG3498> if<WG1487> the dead<WG3498> rise<WG1453> not<WG3756> at all?<WG3654> why<WG5101> are they then<WG2532> baptized<WG907> for<WG5228> the<WG3588> dead?<WG3498>
And <WG2532> why<WG5101> stand we in jeopardy<WG2793> <WG2249> every<WG3956> hour?<WG5610>
I protest<WG3513> by your<WG2251> rejoicing<WG2746> which<WG3739> I have<WG2192> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> our<WG2257> Lord,<WG2962> I die<WG599> daily.<WG2596> <WG2250>

If <WG1487> after the manner<WG2596> of men<WG444> I have fought with beasts<WG2341> at<WG1722> Ephesus,<WG2181> what<WG5101> advantageth<WG3786> it me,<WG3427> if<WG1487> the dead<WG3498> rise<WG1453> not?<WG3756> let us eat<WG5315> and<WG2532> drink;<WG4095> for<WG1063> tomorrow<WG839> we die.<WG599>
Be not<WG3361> deceived:<WG4105> evil<WG2556> communications<WG3657> corrupt<WG5351> good<WG5543> manners.<WG2239>

Awake <WG1594> to righteousness,<WG1346> and<WG2532> sin<WG264> not;<WG3361> for<WG1063> some<WG5100> have not the knowledge<WG2192> <WG56> of God:<WG2316> I speak<WG3004> this to<WG4314> your<WG5213> shame.<WG1791>
But <WG235> some<WG5100> man will say,<WG2046> How<WG4459> are the<WG3588> dead<WG3498> raised up?<WG1453> and<WG1161> with what<WG4169> body<WG4983> do they come?<WG2064>
Thou fool,<WG878> that which<WG3739> thou<WG4771> sowest<WG4687> is not<WG3756> quickened,<WG2227> except<WG3362> it die: <WG599>

And <WG2532> that which<WG3739> thou sowest,<WG4687> thou sowest<WG4687> not<WG3756> that body<WG4983> that shall be,<WG1096> but<WG235> bare<WG1131> grain,<WG2848> <WG1487> it may chance<WG5177> of wheat,<WG4621> or<WG2228> of some<WG5100> other<WG3062> grain:
But <WG1161> God<WG2316> giveth<WG1325> it<WG846> a body<WG4983> as<WG2531> it hath pleased<WG2309> him, and<WG2532> to every<WG1538> seed<WG4690> his own<WG2398> body.<WG4983>

All <WG3956> flesh<WG4561> is not<WG3756> the<WG3588> same<WG846> flesh:<WG4561> but<WG235> there is one<WG243> kind<WG3303> of flesh<WG4561> of men,<WG444> <WG1161> another<WG243> flesh<WG4561> of beasts,<WG2934> <WG1161> another<WG243> of fishes,<WG2486> and<WG1161> another<WG243> of birds.<WG4421>

There are also<WG2532> celestial<WG2032> bodies,<WG4983> and<WG2532> bodies<WG4983> terrestrial:<WG1919> but<WG235> the<WG3588> glory<WG1391> of the<WG3588> celestial<WG2032> is<WG3303> one,<WG2087> and<WG1161> the<WG3588> glory of the<WG3588> terrestrial<WG1919> is another.<WG2087>

There is one<WG243> glory<WG1391> of the sun,<WG2246> and<WG2532> another<WG243> glory<WG1391> of the moon,<WG4582> and<WG2532> another<WG243> glory<WG1391> of the stars:<WG792> for<WG1063> one star<WG792> differeth from<WG1308> another star<WG792> in<WG1722> glory.<WG1391>
So <WG3779> also<WG2532> is the<WG3588> resurrection<WG386> of the<WG3588> dead.<WG3498> It is sown<WG4687> in<WG1722> corruption;<WG5356> it is raised<WG1453> in<WG1722> incorruption: <WG861>
It is sown<WG4687> in<WG1722> dishonor;<WG819> it is raised<WG1453> in<WG1722> glory:<WG1391> it is sown<WG4687> in<WG1722> weakness;<WG769> it is raised<WG1453> in<WG1722> power: <WG1411>

It is sown<WG4687> a natural<WG5591> body;<WG4983> it is raised<WG1453> a spiritual<WG4152> body.<WG4983> There is<WG2076> a natural<WG5591> body,<WG4983> and<WG2532> there is<WG2076> a spiritual<WG4152> body.<WG4983>

And <WG2532> so<WG3779> it is written,<WG1125> The<WG3588> first<WG4413> man<WG444> Adam<WG76> was made<WG1096> a<WG1519> living<WG2198> soul;<WG5590> the<WG3588> last<WG2078> Adam<WG76> was made<WG1519> a quickening<WG2227> spirit.<WG4151>
Howbeit <WG235> that was not<WG3756> first<WG4412> which is spiritual,<WG4152> but<WG235> that which is natural;<WG5591> and afterward<WG1899> that which is spiritual.<WG4152>
The <WG3588> first<WG4413> man<WG444> is of<WG1537> the earth,<WG1093> earthy:<WG5517> the<WG3588> second<WG1208> man<WG444> is the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> from<WG1537> heaven.<WG3772>

As <WG3634> is the<WG3588> earthy,<WG5517> such<WG5108> are they also that are earthy:<WG5517> <WG2532> and<WG2532> as<WG3634> is the<WG3588> heavenly,<WG2032> such<WG5108> are they also that are heavenly.<WG2032> <WG2532>
And <WG2532> as<WG2531> we have borne<WG5409> the<WG3588> image<WG1504> of the<WG3588> earthy,<WG5517> we shall also<WG2532> bear<WG5409> the<WG3588> image<WG1504> of the<WG3588> heavenly.<WG2032>

Now <WG1161> this<WG5124> I say,<WG5346> brethren,<WG80> that<WG3754> flesh<WG4561> and<WG2532> blood<WG129> cannot<WG1410> <WG3756> inherit<WG2816> the kingdom<WG932> of God;<WG2316> neither<WG3761> doth corruption<WG5356> inherit<WG2816> incorruption.<WG861>
Behold, <WG2400> I show<WG3004> you<WG5213> a mystery;<WG3466> We shall not<WG3756> all<WG3956> sleep,<WG2837> but<WG1161> we shall all<WG3956> be changed,<WG236>

In <WG1722> a moment,<WG823> in<WG1722> the twinkling<WG4493> of an eye,<WG3788> at<WG1722> the<WG3588> last<WG2078> trump:<WG4536> for<WG1063> the trumpet shall sound,<WG4537> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> dead<WG3498> shall be raised<WG1453> incorruptible,<WG862> and<WG2532> we<WG2249> shall be changed.<WG236>
For <WG1063> this<WG5124> corruptible<WG5349> must<WG1163> put on<WG1746> incorruption,<WG861> and<WG2532> this<WG5124> mortal<WG2349> must put on<WG1746> immortality.<WG110>

So <WG1161> when<WG3752> this<WG5124> corruptible<WG5349> shall have put on<WG1746> incorruption,<WG861> and<WG2532> this<WG5124> mortal<WG2349> shall have put on<WG1746> immortality,<WG110> then<WG5119> shall be brought to pass<WG1096> the<WG3588> saying<WG3056> that is written,<WG1125> Death<WG2288> is swallowed up<WG2666> in<WG1519> victory.<WG3534>
O death,<WG2288> where<WG4226> is thy<WG4675> sting?<WG2759> O grave,<WG86> where<WG4226> is thy<WG4675> victory?<WG3534>
<WG1161> The<WG3588> sting<WG2759> of death<WG2288> is sin;<WG266> and<WG1161> the<WG3588> strength<WG1411> of sin<WG266> is the<WG3588> law.<WG3551>
But <WG1161> thanks<WG5485> be to God,<WG2316> which giveth<WG1325> us<WG2254> the<WG3588> victory<WG3534> through<WG1223> our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>

Therefore, <WG5620> my<WG3450> beloved<WG27> brethren,<WG80> be<WG1096> ye steadfast,<WG1476> unmovable,<WG277> always<WG3842> abounding<WG4052> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> work<WG2041> of the<WG3588> Lord,<WG2962> forasmuch as ye know<WG1492> that<WG3754> your<WG5216> labor<WG2873> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> in vain<WG2756> in<WG1722> the Lord.<WG2962>
